addons.Name: Raid Snapshot
addons.Description:
Addon reworked

Original Author: Raikirifrost

when you make or join a raid you will have a popup window, you can cancel it or chose an activity from the list
once you chose the activity the addon will automatically save the raid frame (participant names, there gear scores if in range, and the class) and begin the session and the csv fille is created
every time someone leaves, join the raid or if the reporter change zone, a new raid frame is added
the session ends when you leave or disband the raid
once the session ends, a summarization section is added, were you will find then

time when the session ended (based on server time)
the duration of the session
the list of all participant who joined and when
the list of all participant who left and when (fuck the leavers)
a copy of the raid frame where you had the upmost of participant
a copy of the raid frame just before you left or disbanded the raid
a copy of the raid frame from the last entry on each zone ( like if you was on bd then you heed to do kraken, you will have the last raid frame taken on karkass)
participants, raid attendance
By zone raid attendance fragmentation

also resolved an issue where the raid frames where stopped from being recorded when the raid lead changes

a copy of the summarization section is also made on a json fille to make it easy to integrate with a discord bot

anyway here is the addon and an example of what the output you get from a session
thx to @Reoky, completed the classmapping of all 364 possible classes


enjoy it ❤️
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: (DOWNLOAD CORE FIRST) DarkMode UPDATES
addons.Description:
This addon will be used for updates to

1. stop everyone having to download 420MB of data every time a patch releases
2. not interfere with their own custom changes they may have made.

Changelog.
v1.4:
Added

custom_deco_golen_chest.dds
icon_item_fatcat.dds
icon_item_red_lion.dds
icon_title_flippers.dds
icon_title_pearl.dds
icon_title_treasure_chest.dds
icon_title_treasure_map.dds
quest_item_b_pearl.dds
quest_item_daru_charm.dds
quest_item_necklace_recipe.dds
quest_item_pearl_necklace.dds
quest_item_pearl_string.dds
quest_item_shark_head.dds

tag_treasure_map.dds

v1.5:
ui\icon\arcustom\

addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: Combat Closet
addons.Description:
Give @Raikirifrost your love for bringing us this beauty (i forgot this part i blame sleep deprivation)

Please read for instructions on how to use existing config.lua

This addon allows you to create gearsets you can swap between at the click of a button, simply click the cogwheel icon, select save current set, give it a name and select your icon and you are done

No more having to modify a config.lua simply put what you want on titles/costumes included and save it with as many as you want

Compatible with existing config.luas from the brazilianswap addon please read below what to do

after installing the addon find your config.lua and copy it into the new addon combatcloset

once in there simply launch the game like normal and enable the addon
after that you are done and can freely delete your config.lua if you wish

some important details if you have custom icons those same icons will display a brown X, you can simply open the cogwheel and edit the icon to a different one and can freely add icons yourself
note you must add another entry into the availableIcons table inside the script if you wish to use custom icons.

If you have any cool looking icons you'd like to see natively in the addon please send me a message on discord with the .dds files

Update v1.1:
Added 5 more icons

Update v1.2:
Showing title no longer changes to stat title or 0 (no title) stays as your current showing title.

Update v1.3:
Added the ability to decide whether your gearset should or should not be edited as well - use the button labeled "Overwrite Set" to OFF or ON (Green)

Update v1.4:
@raikirifrost added ability to use symbols/capital letters and numbers correctly when naming gearsets

Thank you @exec_noir for pointing this out.

Update v1.5:
Modified 2 lines that actively look for an existing addon/ui folder instead of the base ui folder in the game. causing non UI customization users to have _bad.dds returned instead of the texture thanks to @noviern for pointing this out

Update v1.6

Added hotkey functionality, use the combobox (drop downs) when creating or editing a Set and you can hit that hotkey and the set will change

Update 1.7

@raikirifrost fixed hotkey issues stopping edits

design issue brought to attention regarding non darkmode users, name input box is basically invisible, have darkened it a bit
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: Folio 2.0
addons.Description:
This add-on gives you access to a folio where you can set a crafting and selling area to display all available packs, their current rates, the most accurate selling price based on the current rate and your commerce proficiency level.
It also displays the resources required to craft each specialty pack, as well as the current price retrieved from the Auction House.

It summarizes and displays the total crafting cost and the profit you will make from each pack.
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: Passive Tracker
addons.Description:
This add-on creates a window to track the activation and deactivation times of skills and passives.
(You must edit the configuration file to customize the skills and passives to be tracked.)
If you already have a config.lua file, you can retrieve it from the backup folder.

Update: Allow setting a custom .dds directory in config.lua
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: Low Mana indicator
addons.Description:
Shows text on your screen when your mana reaches a certain percentage - uses chat commands and saves to a .txt file in your game folder as other addons do

commands:
!lmn on/off - Enable/disable addon"
!lmn status - Show current settings"
!lmn percent 1-99 - Set mana threshold percentage"
!lmn interval 100-10000 - Set check interval in milliseconds"
!lmn cooldown 1-300 - Set cooldown in seconds"
!lmn move up/down/left/right - Move warning"
!lmn size bigger/smaller - Resize warning text")
!lmn screen on/off/color [name]/colorlist - Screen options"
!lmn reset - Reset position, size and color"
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: Treasure Map Hunter
addons.Description:
This addon will scan your inventory and automatically populate the combobox with all Treasure Map coordinates.

Upon clicking, it will display a compass that will guide you to your treasure.

You can also access a map from the compass to view a web-based map with a marker on the target location.

Update V1.4: 
-Added the sorting by distance
-Added the occurrences sorting so you don't have the same map twice
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: Bag and Item Stat Scanner
addons.Description: Originally by Zilus I fixed this addon to work with 9.5 - this addon is good for finding the correct stat names for your items when for example creating your brazilianswap config file.
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: Talk Dock Core
addons.Description:
This is the heavy work that runs the discord half of  Talk Dock.

Must be uninstalled and reinstalled with every update
addons.Author: dewrot

addons.Name: Talk Dock
addons.Description:
Reinstall if updating to v1.4 and install Talk Dock Core. Addon now loads 2 seconds faster on average!

Talk Dock bridges your Discord server with ArcheRage guild chat, enabling seamless, real-time communication across platforms. Players can be pinged directly in-game. All messages are demojified in game to ensure that emoji content isn't lost. Linked Items, Quests, and Crafts are properly linked in Discord. Bring your guild operations into sync, wherever you are!

• Only people with the addon will be able to see and send messages from in game.
• Must be configured in config
• Addon will pop up 2 terminals, do not touch your keyboard or mouse until the game refocuses!
• In order to update you must uninstall and reinstall the addon as the manager seems to conflict with some file types

Requirements:
① Your discord server must have a dedicated channel for handling handshake.
② All members in Discord must have names that match their in game name otherwise your game may crash
③ You must have a dedicated bot in the discord that can read message content, see guild members, and manage webhooks. This bot must be used by everyone. (Note- Anyone with access to the bot token can cause chaos in your server if they know enough. Share with caution. I am working on making a centralized bot that will be safe to use.)
addons.Author: dewrot

addons.Name: Simple Combat Log (milliseconds)
addons.Description:
Simplified damage received/dealt displays milliseconds
How use:
For damage log activate chat login friends
For take damage log activate partial siege info 


There is a threshold for implementation less than 1000 does not show
and the damage from the fall doesn't show either

You can change the damage threshold in the .lua file
addons.Author: pinkl

addons.Name: Speedometer
addons.Description: Beautiful speedometer for your vehicle
addons.Author: pinkl

addons.Name: Raid Notification
addons.Description: This addon will create a notification window between t-10m and t-1s before each event (I created this range because you can log in at t-5m = p), some are related to game time, some are related to server times.
addons.Author: raikirifrost

addons.Name: Immortal Warden Traker
addons.Description:
This add-on triggers a mark and plays a sound each time cloth or leather armor from the Disciple or Immortal library is activated.

The effect will remain active for the duration of the buff or until a skill damage is used.
addons.Author: raikirifrost

addons.Name: Default Appearances Changer
addons.Description: This addon swaps you to power ranger mode (red and blue characters) at the click of a button
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: (Read Instructions) DarkMode UI Core
addons.Description:
Some prep work required

first step: in-game go to settings-> addons and enable ui customization
second step: close game
third step: preferably delete your existing ui folder inside documents/archerage/addon and then install this addon

This is just the CORE aka the initial download of the UI - I will include an UPDATE addition that will solely be for updates so i am not overwriting peoples custom UI changes, be sure to install that so you can see any additional updates.
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: Allow 200 Max Players
addons.Description: This addon will set the displayed player to 200 rather or not using the Power Ranger mode
addons.Author: raikirifrost

addons.Name: Target Arrow
addons.Description: This add-on will display an arrow pointing to your target if it is off-screen, and will display an arrow above the target if it is not on-screen
addons.Author: raikirifrost

addons.Name: Expiration Checker
addons.Description:
This add-on will display a large icon when you're wearing dirty underwear or a costume.

It will also track the statue's buff and display a red message if it isn't detected.
addons.Author: raikirifrost

addons.Name: Health Plate and Symbol resizing addon
addons.Description:
Originally placed inside the system.cfg these commands have been moved to an addon instead allowing you to character select/enter or exit garden and keep the setting.

 currently has width and height of you and others big box health bars, size of icons above someone heads (X and Heart example) offset between name and guild name.

Modify the values inside PlateAndSymbolResize.lua to whatever you wish
addons.Author: koalaz_au

addons.Name: You Will Die Soon
addons.Description:
This add-on triggers a mark and plays a sound when you are hit by a major, usually fatal, debuff.

If you are hit by multiple debuffs, the mark remains visible until the last one ends.
addons.Author: raikirifrost

addons.Name: Raid Schedules
addons.Description: This addon creates a window with most of the important events that will happen during the day and a countdown for each event if they happen more than once a day.
addons.Author: raikirifrost
